WorkItem.ClosedComment: Working as intended. Make sure Dragon Eye gems are available to the optimizer. Read help on optimizer for further clarification.
WorkItem.Description:
I am trying to setup optimization for my Moonkin and I am setting the following parameters/buffs:
Improved Moonkin Form
Arcane Intellect
Vampiric Touch
Improved Blessing of Wisdom
Moonkin Form
Totem of Wrath
Divine Spirit
Improved Power Word: Fortitude
Blessing of Kings
Faerie Fire
Earth and Moon
Improved Faerie Fire
Flask of the Frost Wyrm
Potion of Speed
Spell Power Food
T7 (25 man) 2 piece set bonus
Â 
Options:
Target level 83
Latency 0.2
Est. Fight Time(min.) 9
Caster Innervate on Self
Innervate Delay 4
Eclipse Type: Lunar
100% moonfire uptime
Rotation: IS/MF/W
I have currently equiped 3 Dragon Eye one and one +23 spell power gem. After running optimization it is saying I will go from 7321.093 score to 7242.232 score by replacing these gems with +19 spell power gems. This is optimizing for overall rating. When I run it for sustained DPS it is saying add the Spirit/Spell power gems instead of a Dragon's Eye or the unique gem. 
If the optimizer is wrong is the item wish list wrong as well?

Comments.Message: Make sure Dragon's Eye gems are marked as available for optimizer by either having a green diamond next to them or being used in an active gemming template.
